title: Omega Squad
body:
So about the new trailer, quick question for anyone working at Riot. One thing I noticed was that the opposing characters were Headhunters, so I got three questions for you (in order of what I think is likely to unlikely to be answered in a straight forward manner).

1) Does this mean that Omega Squad and Headhunters are in the same Universe (like Project and Mecha)?

2) And if you can answer, does this also mean that Omega Squad battled Headhunters in that universe given the info in this trailer?

3) And I doubt you'll be able to answer this clearly (as in without being confusing about it), but does this also mean that the Headhunters won the battle? I'm only asking because, correct me if I'm wrong, but when Omega Squad Teemo came out, I think someone said he was the last of hos squad or something, or it was heavily implied he was.

replies.body: The trailer is just showcasing the new skins - they aren't in the same universe. We picked the headhunters because they are skins inspired by the alien in 'Predator' and if you've seen it the Predator is preying on soldiers just like those in the Omega Squad.
will there be an alien theme line of skins to combat the headhunters then?

Maybe one day!

Oh and mad props to Riot Drawmi, mOOcakes, Riot Gomurai, and TheContactAbel for the trailer - so cool.
{{champion:432}} an alien themed bard skin would look amazing

> [{quoted}](name=Kimchi870,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zQsoVeEN,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-12-29T20:17:19.157+0000)
>
> they have alien invader heimerdinger

alien invader is just generic sci fi alien dude

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zQsoVeEN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-28T04:01:38.018+0000)
>
> The trailer is just showcasing the new skins - they aren't in the same universe. We picked the headhunters because they are skins inspired by the alien in 'Predator' and if you've seen it the Predator is preying on soldiers just like those in the Omega Squad.

Oh, okay. Thanks for the info!!
I know this is out of topic but letting your know that you have a cool summoner's name.
